description:
As one of the nation’s leading personal injury practices, The Rothenberg Law Firm LLP in Cherry Hill, New Jersey, has a cherished legacy that spans more than four decades. Since 1969, we have helped injured clients fight for justice. Our results far surpass the hundred-million dollar mark.

We believe that the true measurement of success, however, goes beyond a dollar figure. Our greatest accomplish is the meaningful difference we have made in the lives of injured clients and their families across the country. Motivated by a passion for helping those in need, we go out of our way to secure the best possible result for every injured client or family member who walks through our door.

The Secret To Our Success

As a firm that values quality over quantity, we bring to every case the determination and dedication it takes to win. Our lawyers never back down from a challenge. At the same, we always place clients’ needs first – your needs will shape the approach we take, whether that means presenting a rock-solid case at trial or strategically negotiating a fair settlement.

We treat every client like family. This philosophy – what we call “The Rothenberg Way” – has translated into consistent positive results that we, and our clients, are proud of.

Discuss Your Concerns

To speak with a lawyer about your case, call 800-697-9967. We offer contingency fee representation – which means you won’t pay attorney fees unless we win your case – and the initial consultation is free. We have convenient offices in New Jersey, Philadelphia and New York.
